name: MyRituals
0:
”Alexa, open my rituals”
”Alexa, start my rituals”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my rituals
Developer Terms of Use
des:
My Rituals is a guided ritual skill to help you start and end your day right.

(For those who can barely get out of bed in the morning)

Ritual will guide you through the following morning/nightly routines:

- Brushing your teeth
- Flossing
- Washing your face
- Preparing breakfast
- Taking medicine and vitamins
- A quick morning workout
- And set you up to work on your passion

Originally developed for myself personally, I have decided to share it with you. 

Works best with multiple echo's around your house, or the echo earbuds or echo frames.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
